name: Body Combat
description: BODYCOMBAT is an exercise class that lets you punch and kick your way towards your fitness goals. Not only is it a great whole-body workout for cardio fitness,...

name: Yoga Fitness
description: Yoga is an ancient form of exercise that focuses on strength, flexibility and breathing to boost physical and mental wellbeing.

name: Zumba Fitness
description: Zumba is a fitness program that combines Latin and international music with dance moves.

name: Cardio Training
description: Cardio exercise, which is sometimes referred to as aerobic exercise, is any rhythmic activity that raises your heart rate into your target heart rate zone.

name: CrossFit Trainig
description: A form of high intensity interval training, CrossFit is a strength and conditioning workout that is made up of functional movement performed at a high intensity level.

name: Weight Loss
description: Weight training is a common type of strength training for developing the strength and size of skeletal muscles.

name: Strength Training
description: Strength training — also known as weight or resistance training — is physical activity designed to improve muscular strength and fitness by exercising a specific muscle or muscle group against external resistance,

name: Women's only Studio
description: We offers our female members a private, comfortable ladies-only workout facility within our fitness clubs for stress-free workouts.

name: Shake bar & Snacks
description: n addition to shakes, we serve a wide array of heart healthy snacks ranging from homemade granola to fruit salad.

name: Steam & Sauna room
description: A steam room is a heated room that people use for relaxation and to relieve some medical conditions. They are often found in gyms or spas.
